question: Which among the following conditions will give birth to Fraternal Twins?
option1: a single egg is fertilized to form one zygote which then divides into two separate embryos
option2: sperm cells fertilize both the ovum and the second polar body
option3: two eggs are independently fertilized by two different sperm cells
answer: two eggs are independently fertilized by two different sperm cells
explanation: Fraternal twins are also called as dizygotic twins. In this type of pregnancy two eggs are independently fertilized by two different sperm cells. These types of twins may be of the same or different sexes.
